item.title: PowerShell Projects
item.description: Prose Grinder Pandoc Templates Contributor of PowerShell port Premade scripts to format manuscripts for traditional (book) publishing, using Pandoc’s templating features. Nonfiction and fiction manuscripts look plain and startingly similar to Markdown. Hence, in order to make the process less tedious for authors, we recommend writing your chapters with Markdown. Many authors use Windows, so a Windows-compatible port of the Prose Grinder utilities are needed.

item.title: Python Projects
item.description: Confluence Stale Reminder (WIP) This is a utility for finding stale pages (pages which are over 6 months old) and emailing people to update them. Source Future: Archiving capabilities. MkDocs Material Codelab Theme This theme is perfect for task-based documentation: procedures, cookbooks, tutorials, and checklists. ðŸ‘‰ Demo It is a derivation of Hugo Codelab Themes (which are clones of an older version of Google Codelabs), which can integrate and look consistent with MkDocs Material Theme.

item.title: CSS Periodic Table
item.description: It is available on desktop and collapsed on mobile.

item.title: Enable Port Forwarding for IPFS on a Fios router
item.description: .note img{border:1px solid black;} If you use an IPv4 address and want to share files using the InterPlanetary File System protocol on your home network, the recommended way is to set port forwarding. Port forwarding on the router is manufacturer-specific, so this quick guide shows how to do it with Verizon Fios. Typically most routers use https://192.168.1.1/ as their admin access IP address. Open a browser and go to the address https://192.

item.title: JavaScript Projects
item.description: Parrot Another abandoned personal project. Supposed to be a virtual pet, got distracted with design and modeling. Click and drag to rotate. .zdog-canvas { background: transparent; cursor: move; border:1px solid black; max-width:100%; } Pose Stand Flat In Flight Curl Toes Wings Fold Wings Mouth Chew Nod Loops Blink Loop Idle Loop Reset Polly.

item.title: Wordless Instructions
item.description: Create an instruction set for a hypothetical machine that can make plants grow. Cannot use words. Direct link to PDF. Drawn with Adobe Illustrator.
